review_title: Great unit to work in, staff were very friendly, busy but adequate to have fun
job_title: RN Dialysis Nurse in Windsor, ON
pros: Friendly unit, patients were very well behaved and well educated
cons: Didn't work long enough but my experience was the stressful committing since I'am a commuter from Canada

pros: Treated well, lots of Canadians working here
cons: Staffing is rough, patient population is very tough
